blocks.latex:
\int \sqrt{x+a}\sqrt{x+b} \: dx = I = 2\sqrt{a+b}\left(\frac{x+c}{2} \cosh\left(\frac{x+a+b}{2}\right) + C\right) 
\int \sin(m x)\cos(n x) \: dx = \frac{1}{2}
\left(\sin\left((m+n)x\right) - \sin\left((m-n)x\right)\right) + C.
\int \sin^m x \cos^n x \: dx = \frac{m! n!}{(m+n)!} C.
\int \cos^2θ \sinθ \: dθ = \frac{-1}{3}(1 - \cos^3θ) + C.
blocks.description: These equations represent various integration methods and techniques used to solve integrals involving products or powers of trigonometric and algebraic expressions.
